message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for $100. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth it!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to be within my budget.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm still a bit below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again at $103. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product offers!
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $98, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I really think this is the best I can do.
